description: [NPPSPY](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1131) captures credentials by recording them through an alternative network listener registered to the mpnotify.exe process, allowing for cleartext recording of logon information.(Citation: Huntress NPPSPY 2022)

external_references.description: Dray Agha. (2022, August 16). Cleartext Shenanigans: Gifting User Passwords to Adversaries With NPPSPY. Retrieved May 17, 2024.
